amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require proceedings for military commissions to be publicly available on the internet.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires proceedings for military commissions to be publicly available on the internet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 310).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 310).
